text: Sir Anthony Frank Mason (born 21 April 1925) is an Australian judge. He served as the ninth Chief Justice of Australia, in office from 1987 to 1995. He became a justice of the High Court of Australia in 1972. He was born in Sydney, New South Wales. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:Living people Category:Chief justices of Australia Category:People from Sydney Category:Knights and Dames Commander of the Order of the British Empire Category:Order of Australia
title: Anthony Mason (judge)
